00034 
00035 #ifndef HARPS_COMPORNENT_BRANCHBYNOTE
00036 #define HARPS_COMPORNENT_BRANCHBYNOTE
00037 
00038 #include <harps/dummy.hpp>
00039 #include <harps/utils.hpp>
00040 #include <harps/clock.hpp>
00041 #include <harps/buffer.hpp>
00042 #include <harps/note.hpp>
00043 #include <harps/config.hpp>
00044 
00045 #include <harps/compornent/combiner.hpp>
00046 
00047 #include <boost/preprocessor.hpp>
00048 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00049 #include <boost/ref.hpp>
00050 #include <boost/function.hpp>
00051 
00052 #define HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_TYPENAME( z, module_index, total ) \
00053   typename BOOST_PP_CAT( ModuleType, module_index ) \
00054     BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF( BOOST_PP_NOT_EQUAL( module_index, BOOST_PP_SUB( total, 1 ) ) )
00055 
00056 #define HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_MEMBER( z, module_index, unused ) \
00057   BOOST_PP_CAT( ModuleType, module_index ) BOOST_PP_CAT( module, module_index );
00058 
00059 #define HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_MEMBER( z, module_index, unused ) \
00060   BOOST_PP_CAT( ModuleType, module_index ) BOOST_PP_CAT( module, module_index );
00061 
00062 #define HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_CASE( z, module_index, unused ) \
00063   case module_index : \
00064     BOOST_PP_CAT( module, module_index ) ( _buffer, _clock, _note ); \
00065     break;
00066 
00067 #define HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_ARRAY( z, module_index, type ) \
00068   BOOST_PP_CAT( type, _modules )[ module_index ] = boost::ref( BOOST_PP_CAT( module, module_index ) );
00069 
00070 namespace harps {
00071   namespace compornent {
00075     template<
00076       BOOST_PP_REPEAT( 128, HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_TYPENAME, 128 )
00077     >
00078       class BranchByNote {
00079         public:
00080           BranchByNote() {
00081             BOOST_PP_REPEAT( 128, HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_ARRAY, float )
00082             BOOST_PP_REPEAT( 128, HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_ARRAY, double )
00083           }
00084           template< typename SampleType >
00085             inline void operator()( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00086               switch( _clock.getTone() ) {
00087                 BOOST_PP_REPEAT( 128, HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_CASE, 128 )
00088                 default:
00089                   int index;
00090                   typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00091                   for( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ )
00092                     raw_buffer[ index ] = 0.0f;
00093               };
00094             }
00095           template<>
00096             inline void operator()< float >( Buffer< float > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00097               float_modules[ _clock.getTone() ]( _buffer, _clock, _note );
00098             }
00099           template<>
00100             inline void operator()< double >( Buffer< double > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00101               double_modules[ _clock.getTone() ]( _buffer, _clock, _note );
00102             }
00103         private:
00104           BOOST_PP_REPEAT( 128, HARPS_PP_BRANCHBYNOTE_MEMBER, 128 )
00105           boost::array< boost::function< void ( Buffer< float >&, CurrentTime&, Note& ) > 128 > float_modules;
00106           boost::array< boost::function< void ( Buffer< double >&, CurrentTime&, Note& ) > 128 > double_modules;
00107       };
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00111 #endif
